info.name: OffsetFX
info.comment: A filter effect that offsets the position of an input source.

description.p: This filter offsets the input image relative to its current position in the image space by the specified vector of (XOffset,YOffset).

action.name: Draw
action.comment: Draws object graphics to drawable areas.
action.prototype: ERR acDraw(*Object, DOUBLE X, DOUBLE Y, DOUBLE Width, DOUBLE Height)

input.param: The X position of the region to be drawn.
The Y position of the region to be drawn.
The width of the region to be drawn.
The height of the region to be drawn.

field.name: XMLDef
field.comment: Returns an SVG compliant XML string that describes the effect.

field.name: XOffset
field.comment: The delta X coordinate for the input graphic.

description.p: The (XOffset, YOffset) field values define the offset of the input source within the target clipping area.

field.name: YOffset
field.comment: The delta Y coordinate for the input graphic.

description.p: The (XOffset, YOffset) field values define the offset of the input source within the target clipping area.
